org.extremecomponents.table.cell
Interface Cell

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCell, FilterCell, FilterDroplistCell, HeaderCell, SelectAllHeaderCell, TreeCell
public interface Cell

All table cells need to implement the Cell interface.

Jeff Johnston
